{lang doc:rewrite_note}

Apache Web Server({lang doc:rewrite_yun})

RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/view-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:view&d=$2&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/view-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:view&d=$2&ps=$3&seo=1&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/edit-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:edit&d=$2&%1	
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/down-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:down&d=$2&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/doc-upload\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:upload&%1	
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4&%1	
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4&%1	
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4&p=$5&k=$6&s=$7&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4&s=$5&%1	
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4&p=$5&k=$6&s=$7&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&%1	
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&%1	
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&p=$6&k=$7&s=$8&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&s=$6&%1	
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&p=$6&k=$7&s=$8&%1

Apache Web Server({lang doc:rewrite_host})

RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^view-([0-9]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:view&d=$1&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^view-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:view&d=$1&ps=$2&seo=1&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^edit-([0-9]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:edit&d=$1&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^down-([0-9]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:down&d=$1&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^doc-upload\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:upload&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$1-$2-$3&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$1-$2-$3&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$1-$2-$3&p=$4&k=$5&s=$6&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$1-$2-$3&s=$4&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$1-$2-$3&p=$4&k=$5&s=$6&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$1-$2-$3-$4&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$1-$2-$3-$4&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$1-$2-$3-$4&p=$5&k=$6&s=$7&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$1-$2-$3-$4&s=$5&%1
RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^(.*)$
RewriteRule ^mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$1-$2-$3-$4&p=$5&k=$6&s=$7&%1

IIS Web Server({lang doc:rewrite_yun})

RewriteRule ^(.*)/view-([0-9]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:view&d=$2&$4
RewriteRule ^(.*)/view-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:view&d=$2&ps=$3&seo=1&$5
RewriteRule ^(.*)/edit-([0-9]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:edit&d=$2&$4
RewriteRule ^(.*)/down-([0-9]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:down&d=$2&$4
RewriteRule ^(.*)/doc-upload\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:upload&$3
RewriteRule ^(.*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4&$6
RewriteRule ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4&$6
RewriteRule ^(.*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4&p=$5&k=$6&s=$7&$9
RewriteRule ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-s([0-9-]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4&s=$5&$7
RewriteRule ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4&p=$5&k=$6&s=$7&$9
RewriteRule ^(.*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&$7
RewriteRule ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&$7
RewriteRule ^(.*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&p=$6&k=$7&s=$8&$10
RewriteRule ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-s([0-9-]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&s=$6&$9
RewriteRule ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html(\?(.*))*$ $1/plugin\.php\?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&p=$6&k=$7&s=$8&$10

IIS7 Web Server({lang doc:rewrite_yun})

<rule name="doc_view">
            <match url="^(.*/)*view-([0-9]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:view&amp;d={R:2}&amp;{R:3}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_views">
            <match url="^(.*/)*view-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:view&amp;d={R:2}&amp;ps={R:3}&amp;seo=1&amp;{R:4}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_edit">
            <match url="^(.*/)*edit-([0-9]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:edit&amp;d={R:2}&amp;{R:3}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_down">
            <match url="^(.*/)*down-([0-9]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:down&amp;d={R:2}&amp;{R:3}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_upload">
            <match url="^(.*/)*doc-upload.html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:upload&amp;{R:2}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_list">
            <match url="^(.*/)*list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:list&amp;t={R:2}-{R:3}-{R:4}&amp;{R:5}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_mydoc">
            <match url="^(.*/)*mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:mydoc&amp;t={R:2}-{R:3}-{R:4}&amp;{R:5}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_list2">
            <match url="^(.*/)*list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:list&amp;t={R:2}-{R:3}-{R:4}&amp;p={R:5}&amp;k={R:6}&amp;s={R:7}&amp;{R:8}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_mydoc2">
            <match url="^(.*/)*mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-s([0-9-]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:mydoc&amp;t={R:2}-{R:3}-{R:4}&amp;s={R:5}&amp;{R:6}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_mydoc3">
            <match url="^(.*/)*mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:mydoc&amp;t={R:2}-{R:3}-{R:4}&amp;p={R:5}&amp;k={R:6}&amp;s={R:7}&amp;{R:8}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_list3">
            <match url="^(.*/)*list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:list&amp;t={R:2}-{R:3}-{R:4}-{R:5}&amp;{R:6}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_mydoc4">
            <match url="^(.*/)*mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:mydoc&amp;t={R:2}-{R:3}-{R:4}-{R:5}&amp;{R:6}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_list4">
            <match url="^(.*/)*list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:list&amp;t={R:2}-{R:3}-{R:4}-{R:5}&amp;p={R:6}&amp;k={R:7}&amp;s={R:8}&amp;{R:9}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_mydoc5">
            <match url="^(.*/)*mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-s([0-9-]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:mydoc&amp;t={R:2}-{R:3}-{R:4}-{R:5}&amp;s={R:6}&amp;{R:7}" />
</rule>
<rule name="doc_mydoc6">
            <match url="^(.*/)*mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+).html\?*(.*)$" />
            <action type="Rewrite" url="{R:1}/plugin.php\?id=doc:mydoc&amp;t={R:2}-{R:3}-{R:4}-{R:5}&amp;p={R:6}&amp;k={R:7}&amp;s={R:8}&amp;{R:9}" />
</rule>

Zeus Web Server

match URL into $ with ^(.*)/view-([0-9]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:view&d=$2&$3
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/view-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:view&d=$2&ps=$3&seo=1&$4
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/edit-([0-9]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:edit&d=$2&$3
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/down-([0-9]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:down&d=$2&$3
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/doc-upload\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:upload&$2
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4&$5
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4&$5
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4&p=$5&k=$6&s=$7&$8
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-s([0-9-]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4&s=$5&$6
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4&p=$5&k=$6&s=$7&$8
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&$6
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&$6
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&p=$6&k=$7&s=$8&$9
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-s([0-9-]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&s=$6&$7
endif
match URL into $ with ^(.*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html\?*(.*)$
if matched then
	set URL = $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&p=$6&k=$7&s=$8&$9
endif

Nginx Web Server

rewrite ^([^\.]*)/view-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:view&d=$2 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/view-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:view&d=$2&ps=$3&seo=1 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/edit-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:edit&d=$2 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/down-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:down&d=$2 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/doc-upload\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:upload last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4&p=$5&k=$6&s=$7 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4&s=$5 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4&p=$5&k=$6&s=$7 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4-$5 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4-$5 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/list-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:list&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&p=$6&k=$7&s=$8 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&s=$6 last;
rewrite ^([^\.]*)/mydoc-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-([0-9]+)-p([0-9]+)-k(.*)-s([0-9-]+)\.html$ $1/plugin.php?id=doc:mydoc&t=$2-$3-$4-$5&p=$6&k=$7&s=$8 last;
